Direct Known Subclasses:
DomXmlAttribute
public abstract class SpinXmlAttribute extends SpinXmlNode<SpinXmlAttribute>
An attribute in a tree-oriented XML data format.
Author:
Sebastian Menski, Daniel Meyer
